title: Why cant people in sliver cooperate with the jungle

replies.body: People in silver are not allowed to cooperate with the jungler most of the time. Those who do get relegated to gold.
Maybe if me and my support are winning a 2v3 and our{{champion:35}} jg comes in KSs all 3 kills taxes 2 full waves of minions then doesn't want to drag, it may not be the laner's fault ALL the time
I dont tax any farm. Only if i know my teamates would never get it due to the tower eating it then i make sure its not wasted.
Damn, someone who act PLAYS jg well!!! I NEVER get those in my games :(
Map awareness and laning (instead of killtrading as fast as possible pre6). Do not expect to see this below either gold or adult players, whichever is lower.
